op_title: Formalize V2.2 Core Game Mechanics & Calculation Rules from Miro
primary_deliverable: A comprehensive technical specification document translating Miro rules into pseudo-code/algorithmic descriptions.

op_title: Codify Core Game Data & Infrastructure Parameters (GameData Module)
primary_deliverable: A functional JavaScript module (`GameData.js`) containing all V2.2 static game data as constants.

op_title: Develop Game State Management Module (GameState Module)
primary_deliverable: A functional JavaScript module (`GameState.js`) for managing all dynamic game state properties, with unit tests.

op_title: Implement Water Flow Simulation Logic (FlowPhase Module)
primary_deliverable: A functional JavaScript module (`FlowPhase.js`) accurately simulating the V2.2 Flow Phase, with unit tests.

op_title: Implement Operations & Maintenance Calculation Logic (Maintenance Module)
primary_deliverable: A functional JavaScript module (`Maintenance.js`) correctly calculating O&M costs and applying penalties, with unit tests.

op_title: Implement Game Scoring & Flood Point Tracking Logic (Scoring Module)
primary_deliverable: A functional JavaScript module (`Scoring.js`) for accurately calculating and tracking Flood Points, with unit tests.

op_title: Develop Core Game Loop Orchestration Logic
primary_deliverable: An initial JavaScript script/module (`GameEngineCore.js`) orchestrating the high-level game round sequence.

op_title: Verify Integrated Core Mechanics Engine Against V2.2 Rule Set
primary_deliverable: A Quality Assurance test report documenting execution of game scenarios and confirming alignment with V2.2 rules via console/state inspection.

op_title: Design UI Mockups & User Flow Schematics for Creek Connections
primary_deliverable: A set of visual mockups for all key game screens and a user flow diagram illustrating player navigation.

op_title: Develop Interactive Watershed Map Renderer Component
primary_deliverable: A functional JavaScript component rendering the game's watershed map with user interaction capabilities.

op_title: Implement Dynamic Infrastructure Placement & Upgrade Panel
primary_deliverable: A functional UI component for displaying, selecting, and placing/upgrading infrastructure, updating GameState.

op_title: Develop Real-Time Game Status Display Components
primary_deliverable: Functional UI components for Scoreboard, Budget Tracker, and Round/Phase Tracker, updating in real-time from GameState.

op_title: Implement Player Action Controls & Game Event Triggers
primary_deliverable: Functional UI buttons/controls for player actions that trigger game logic and update the UI.

op_title: Implement Basic Visual Feedback for Game Events
primary_deliverable: Basic visual cues and animations for key game events (water flow, flood markers, penalty indicators).

op_title: Initial UI/UX Playability & Heuristic Evaluation
primary_deliverable: A report detailing findings from an initial playability test and heuristic evaluation of the UI, identifying issues and improvements.

op_title: Define Data Structures for Campaign Phases & Event Cards
primary_deliverable: A technical document specifying data structures for multi-phase campaign progression and Event Card format/content.

op_title: Develop Campaign Management Logic
primary_deliverable: A functional JavaScript module (`CampaignManager.js`) handling transitions between campaign phases and managing state.

op_title: Implement Event Card System Logic
primary_deliverable: A functional system to draw, present, and trigger effects of Event Cards.

op_title: Integrate All V2.2 Event Card Content
primary_deliverable: All defined V2.2 Event Card data fully encoded and integrated into the Event Card System.

op_title: Implement Scenario & Phase Objective Display & Tracking
primary_deliverable: UI elements and underlying logic to display current phase objectives and track progress.

op_title: Develop Game State Persistence Mechanism (Client-Side)
primary_deliverable: A functional client-side mechanism (e.g., LocalStorage) to save and load campaign progress.

op_title: Test Full Campaign Playthrough & Phase Transitions
primary_deliverable: A test report confirming successful execution of a full 3-phase campaign, validating transitions, rules, and objectives.

op_title: Define Data Schema for Player Actions & Game Outcomes Logging
primary_deliverable: A specification document detailing the schema for logged data (actions, events, outcomes).

op_title: Implement Player Action & Game Event Logging System
primary_deliverable: A functional JavaScript module that automatically logs defined player actions and game events.

op_title: Develop Game Outcome Recording Mechanism
primary_deliverable: Functionality to capture and store the final state of a completed game (scores, budget, win/loss status).

op_title: Implement Client-Side Data Export Feature (JSON/CSV)
primary_deliverable: A user-triggered feature to download aggregated gameplay data and outcomes as JSON or CSV.

op_title: Verify Data Logging Integrity & Export Accuracy
primary_deliverable: A test report confirming correct logging of actions/events, accurate outcome recording, and well-formed data exports.

op_title: Conduct Cross-Browser & Device Compatibility Testing
primary_deliverable: A test report detailing game performance and visual consistency across specified browsers and devices, identifying bugs.

op_title: Implement Foundational Web Accessibility Features (WCAG AA)
primary_deliverable: Game interface updated with key accessibility features (keyboard navigation, ARIA, color contrast) aiming for WCAG 2.1 AA.

op_title: Perform Code & Asset Performance Optimization
primary_deliverable: Optimized game code and assets resulting in improved load times, smoother animations, and reduced overhead.

primary_deliverable: A user-friendly guide detailing how to play, rules, UI, objectives, and campaign structure.

op_title: Coordinate & Analyze External User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
primary_deliverable: A summary report of feedback from external UAT, focusing on usability, clarity, engagement, learning, and bugs.

primary_deliverable: A production-ready build of the web application and documentation for deploying to a standard web hosting platform.

primary_deliverable: A document outlining recommended hosting, deployment process, and initial monitoring/maintenance.

op_title: Final Accessibility Compliance Audit & Remediation
primary_deliverable: An audit report verifying accessibility implementation against WCAG guidelines, with record of remediations.
